column4: Does anybody know how to make ChatZilla start in a tab in firefox when I start my computer? Or at least how to make it start up?
you can put firefox in your startup programs, and you can use session saver to remember your default tabs (I'm 90% sure).  couple that together and you've got what you're after.
I actually have Fx startup with my computer, but Chatzilla doesn't open in a tab
